es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the connection between server and client. This class allows us to send/receive objects using the given socket.
    Author:
    David Fdez Alcoba, Manuel Sanchez Torron
